definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The only thing you can give is antihistamine to reduce itching.
sentences.chinese: 你唯一可以給予抗組織胺，減少瘙癢。

sentences.english: Natural antihistamines do not cause these side effects.
sentences.chinese: 然而從自然界提取的抗組織胺是不會導致副作用的。

sentences.english: The antioxidant helps to block histamine.
sentences.chinese: 抗氧化劑有利於阻止組織胺酵素起作用。

sentences.english: However, common medicines with antihistamine drugs tend to dry the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 然而，常見的抗組織胺藥傾向於使肺部變得乾燥。
